js.home: const cate=env.get("category");const page=env.get("page");const url=`${env.baseUrl}/index.php/vod/type/id/${cate}/page/${page}.html`;const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_2_1 like Mac OS X)AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/18.2 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1"}});const $=kitty.load(html);const movies=[];$('.post-list .col-md-3').each((_,element)=>{const videoItem=$(element).find('.video-item');const entryTitle=$(element).find('.entry-title');const vodUrl=entryTitle.find('a').attr('href');const vodPic=videoItem.find('.featured-content-image a img').attr('data-original');const vodName=entryTitle.find('a').text().trim();const remark=videoItem.find('span.model-view-left').text().trim();const duration=videoItem.find('span.model-view').text().trim();const fullText=entryTitle.text().trim();const pubdate=fullText.replace(vodName,'').trim();movies.push({id:vodUrl??"",cover:vodPic??"",title:vodName,remark:remark,desc:`${duration}|${pubdate}`})});return movies
js.detail: function base64Decode(e){const t="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";let n="",r,i,s,a,o,u,l=0;for(e=e.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9+/=]/g,"");l<e.length;)a=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),o=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),u=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),l=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),r=a<<2|o>>4,i=(15&o)<<4|u>>2,s=(3&u)<<6|l,n+=String.fromCharCode(r),64!=u&&(n+=String.fromCharCode(i)),64!=l&&(n+=String.fromCharCode(s));return n}const movieId=env.get("movieId");const url=`${env.baseUrl}${movieId}`;const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_2_1 like Mac OS X)AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/18.2 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1"}});const $=kitty.load(html);const scriptContent=$('script').filter((_,el)=>{return $(el).html().includes('player_aaaa')}).html();if(!scriptContent){return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤çº¿è·¯",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",id:url}]}]}};const playerMatch=scriptContent.match(/var player_aaaa\s*=\s*({[^;]+);/);if(!playerMatch){return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤çº¿è·¯",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",id:url}]}]}};try{const playerStr=playerMatch[1].replace(/(\w+):/g,'"$1":');const playerData=JSON.parse(playerStr);const encodedUrl=playerData.url;if(!encodedUrl){return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤çº¿è·¯",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",id:url}]}]}};const base64Decoded=base64Decode(encodedUrl);const decodedUrl=decodeURIComponent(base64Decoded);return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤çº¿è·¯",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",url:decodedUrl}]}]}}catch(error){return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤çº¿è·¯",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",id:url}]}]}}
js.search: const keyword=env.get("keyword");const page=env.get("page");const encodedKeyword=encodeURIComponent(keyword);const url=`${env.baseUrl}/index.php/vod/search/by/time_add/page/${page}/wd/${encodedKeyword}.html`;const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_2_1 like Mac OS X)AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/18.2 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1"}});const $=kitty.load(html);const movies=[];$('.post-list .col-md-3').each((_,element)=>{const videoItem=$(element).find('.video-item');const entryTitle=$(element).find('.entry-title');const vodUrl=entryTitle.find('a').attr('href');const vodPic=videoItem.find('.featured-content-image a img').attr('data-original');const vodName=entryTitle.find('a').text().trim();const remark=videoItem.find('span.model-view-left').text().trim();const duration=videoItem.find('span.model-view').text().trim();const fullText=entryTitle.text().trim();const pubdate=fullText.replace(vodName,'').trim();movies.push({id:vodUrl??"",cover:vodPic??"",title:vodName,remark:remark,desc:`${duration}|${pubdate}`})});return movies
js.parseIframe: function base64Decode(e){const t="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";let n="",r,i,s,a,o,u,l=0;for(e=e.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9+/=]/g,"");l<e.length;)a=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),o=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),u=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),l=t.indexOf(e.charAt(l++)),r=a<<2|o>>4,i=(15&o)<<4|u>>2,s=(3&u)<<6|l,n+=String.fromCharCode(r),64!=u&&(n+=String.fromCharCode(i)),64!=l&&(n+=String.fromCharCode(s));return n}const iframe=env.get("iframe");const html=await req(iframe);const $=kitty.load(html);const script=$("script").toArray().filter(item=>{const text=$(item).text().trim();if(text.startsWith("var player_aaaa"))return true})[0];if(!script){return""};let code=$(script).text().trim().replace("var player_aaaa=","");code=`(${code})`;const unsafeObj=eval(code);if(unsafeObj.encrypt=="1"){unsafeObj.url=unescape(unsafeObj.url)}else if(unsafeObj.encrypt=="2"){const decoded=base64Decode(unsafeObj.url);unsafeObj.url=decodeURIComponent(decoded)}return unsafeObj.url

js.home: const cate=env.get("category");const page=env.get("page");let url='';if(cate==="categories"){url=`${env.baseUrl}/categories/`}else if(cate){url=`${env.baseUrl}/${cate}/`+(page>1?`page/${page}/`:"")}else{url=`${env.baseUrl}/`}try{const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36"}});if(!html){return[]}if(html.includes('Just a moment...')){return[]}const $=kitty.load(html);const movies=[];if(cate==="categories"){$("#list_categories_video_categories_list .video-img-box, .col-6.col-sm-4.col-lg-3").each(function(){const href=$(this).find("a").attr("href");const name=$(this).find("h4").text();const cover=$(this).find("img").attr("src");const count=$(this).find(".absolute-center span, .badge").text();if(href&&name){movies.push({id:href,cover:cover?cover:"",title:name,remark:count})}})}else{const selectors=["[id^='list_videos_'] .row:first .video-img-box",".video-img-box",".row .video-img-box",".container .row .col-md-6 .video-img-box"];for(let sel of selectors){$(sel).each(function(){const href=$(this).find(".img-box a, a").first().attr("href");if(!href)return;const title=$(this).find(".title, h4, .video-title").text();if(!title)return;let cover=$(this).find(".img-box img, img").first().attr("data-src");if(!cover)cover=$(this).find(".img-box img, img").first().attr("src");const subTitle=$(this).find(".sub-title").text();let remark="";if(subTitle){const parts=subTitle.split(/\s*\n\s*/);if(parts.length>=3){remark="ðŸ‘ï¸"+parts[1].trim()+" â¤ï¸"+parts[2].trim()}else{remark=subTitle}}if(!remark){remark=$(this).find(".absolute-bottom-right, .duration, .label").text()}movies.push({id:href,cover:cover?cover:"",title:title.trim(),remark:remark.trim()})});if(movies.length>0)break}}return movies}catch(e){return[]}
js.detail: const movieId=env.get("movieId");let url='';if(movieId.startsWith('http')){url=movieId}else{url=`${env.baseUrl}${movieId}`}try{const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36"}});if(!html||html.includes('Just a moment...')){return{playlist:[]}}const $=kitty.load(html);let script=$('script').filter((_,el)=>{return $(el).text().includes('hlsUrl')}).text();let playUrlMatch=script.match(/var hlsUrl\s*=\s*['"]([^'"]+)['"]/);if(!playUrlMatch){playUrlMatch=script.match(/hlsUrl\s*:\s*['"]([^'"]+)['"]/)}if(playUrlMatch&&playUrlMatch[1]){let playUrl=playUrlMatch[1];return{playlist:[{title:"é»˜è®¤åˆ†ç»„",videos:[{text:"æ’­æ”¾",url:playUrl}]}]}}return{playlist:[]}}catch(e){return{playlist:[]}}
js.search: const keyword=env.get("keyword");const page=env.get("page");const encodedKeyword=encodeURIComponent(keyword);const url=`${env.baseUrl}/search/${encodedKeyword}/`+(page>1?`page/${page}/`:"");try{const html=await req(url,{headers:{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36"}});if(!html||html.includes('Just a moment...')){return[]}const $=kitty.load(html);const movies=[];const selectors=["[id^='list_videos_'] .row:first .video-img-box",".video-img-box"];for(let sel of selectors){$(sel).each(function(){const href=$(this).find(".img-box a").attr("href");const title=$(this).find(".title").text();if(!href||!title)return;let cover=$(this).find(".img-box img").attr('data-src');if(!cover)cover=$(this).find(".img-box img").attr('src');const subTitle=$(this).find(".sub-title").text();let remarks="";if(subTitle){const parts=subTitle.split(/\s*\n\s*/);if(parts.length>=3){remarks="ðŸ‘ï¸"+parts[1].trim()+" â¤ï¸"+parts[2].trim()}}movies.push({id:href,cover:cover?cover:"",title:title,remark:remarks})});if(movies.length>0)break}return movies}catch(e){return[]}
